<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_vsc_updated_settings</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Log latest compliance status</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions>admin</role_conditions> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
// update the compliance status in the lookup table, if the setting exists or create a new one. new sn_vsc.VSCComplianceUtil().updateComplianceStatusLookUp(current.u_setting, current.u_compliance_state); })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-06-15 05:27:05</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>117822bb641f2110f877eb14a37cc176</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Log latest compliance status</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Security Center" source="sn_vsc">a51d46e3f2014110366b10017c5ba675</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Security Center">a51d46e3f2014110366b10017c5ba675</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_117822bb641f2110f877eb14a37cc176</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-06-21 20:08:30</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=117822bb641f2110f877eb14a37cc176"/> </record_update>
